name: Little Princess Pony DressUp - Little Pets Friendship Equestrian Pony Pet Edition - Girls Game
name_original: Little Princess Pony DressUp - Little Pets Friendship Equestrian Pony Pet Edition - Girls Game
description:
Welcome to Little Princess Pony DressUp - Little Pets Friendship Equestrian Pony Pet Edition - Girls Game. Dress up and take care of your own virtual pony.
Design a new look for your lovable pony, then share with your friends! There are different hair, clothes, shoes in this game, your can create cute, stylish as well as funny looks for the ponies. Dress up for your pony, make him become a celebrity pony.
There are a variety of options available for the ponies such as hairstyles, tops, bottoms and shoes and a whole lot of accessories like bracelets, jewelry and decorations!
Dress in your pony bar!
Come on. Dress up your own cute pony!

Key Features:
-Lovely hair accessories for pony
-Princess hairstyles
-Beautiful princess outfits
-Princess accessories
-The app is SAFE and FUN to use!

Hurry Up DOWNLOAD NOW!
